channel.title: Xiaomi.eu, MIUI, Magisk on i0Ek3 の Galaxy
channel.description: Recent content in Xiaomi.eu, MIUI, Magisk on i0Ek3 の Galaxy

item.title: Enable Removed Features and Apps on xiaomi.eu ROM
item.description:
I reused my Android phone Redmi K30 Pro, so I need to install a stable ROM on it, boom, xiaomi.eu is here. But xiaomi.eu ROM reduced some features or apps from China version, so I need to flash magisk and localize modules to enable these features and apps. Before that, you should know what is xiaomi.eu and knows how to install eu ROMs on your phone.

Prerequisites Link to heading

  • Unlock your phone
  • xiaomi.eu ROM(weekly or stable version), download here
  • Localize module files, download here
  • Magisk app, download here
  • Original boot/recovery image, used to patching
  • LSPosed.zip, download here

Or if you have the same phone with mine, download all of these files from here(pwd: q2u5).
